mapper.select: select m.*,mm.mem_mile,mm.membership_id,ms.membership_name from member m inner join mem_membership mm on m.mem_id=mm.mem_id inner join membership ms on mm.membership_id=ms.membership_id WHERE m.mem_id=#{mem_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET mem_role = #{mem_role} WHERE mem_id=#{mem_id}
UPDATE mem_membership SET membership_id = #{membership_id} WHERE mem_id=#{mem_id}
UPDATE membership SET membership_name=#{membership_name}, membership_mile=#{membership_mile}, membership_discount=#{membership_discount} WHERE membership_id=#{membership_id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM notice order by notice_id desc
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET notice_title=#{notice_title}, notice_content=#{notice_content} WHERE notice_id=#{notice_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(notice_title, notice_content, notice_writer, notice_write_date) values(#{notice_title},#{notice_content},#{notice_writer},current_timestamp())
mapper.select: select td.*,ti.ticket_rep_img_path,ti.ticket_detail_img_path,c.city_id,c.city_name,co.country_name from ticket_detail td inner Join ticket_img ti on td.ticket_id = ti.ticket_id inner join city c on td.city_id = c.city_id inner join country co on c.country_id = co.country_id WHERE td.ticket_id=#{ticket_id}
select * from city where country_id = (select country_id from country where country_id=(select country_id from country WHERE country_id=(select country_id from city where city_id=#{city_id})));
SELECT m.* FROM coupon c, mem_coupon m WHERE c.coupon_id = m.coupon_id AND c.coupon_id=#{coupon_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE coupon SET coupon_name=#{coupon_name}, coupon_discount=#{coupon_discount}, coupon_quantity=#{coupon_quantity} WHERE coupon_id=#{coupon_id}
